iti39:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti39:2.1: “Mendicants, the Realized One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha has two approaches to teaching Dhamma.
iti39:2.4: this is the first way of teaching Dhamma.
iti39:2.5: ‘Having seen evil as evil, be disillusioned, dispassionate, and freed from it’—
iti39:2.6: this is the second way of teaching Dhamma.
iti39:2.7: The Realized One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha has these two ways of teaching Dhamma.”
iti39:2.8: That is what the Buddha said.
